title: Fleet
subtitle: Manage your fleet of trucks and drivers

header.title: Fleet Management
header.subtitle: Manage your vehicles, drivers, and fleet operations

drivers.title: Drivers
drivers.addFirstDriverHint: Add your first driver to start managing your team.

emptyState.addFirstDriver: Add your first driver to get started
emptyState.addFirstTruck: Add your first truck to get started
emptyState.addFirstVehicle: Add your first vehicle to start managing your fleet.

vehicles.title: Vehicles
vehicles.addEditVehicles: Add, edit and manage vehicles in your fleet
vehicles.addFirstVehicle: Get started by adding your first vehicle to your fleet.
vehicles.tryAdjustingSearch: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.
vehicles.outOfServiceAlert: {{count}} vehicle is currently out of service. Please schedule maintenance or repairs.
vehicles.outOfServiceAlertPlural: {{count}} vehicles are currently out of service. Please schedule maintenance or repairs.
vehicles.failedToSave: Failed to save vehicle. Please try again.
vehicles.failedToDelete: Failed to delete vehicle. Please try again.
vehicles.failedToLoad: Failed to load vehicles. Please try again later.

vehicles.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
vehicles.tutorialDescription: Register and track all vehicles in your fleet
vehicles.tutorialFeature1Desc: Register trucks with year, make, model, VIN, and license plate
vehicles.tutorialFeature2Desc: Monitor Active, In Maintenance, Out of Service, or Idle vehicles
vehicles.tutorialFeature3Desc: VIN and registration info for DOT and IFTA compliance
vehicles.tutorialFeature4Desc: Download your vehicle list as CSV for reporting
vehicles.tip1: Keep vehicle status updated - it affects dispatch availability
vehicles.tip2: Add VIN for recall tracking and compliance documentation
vehicles.tip3: Use the search to quickly find vehicles by name, make, or license plate
vehicles.tip4: Link vehicles to loads for accurate mileage and fuel tracking
vehicles.tip5: Keep vehicle records updated for accurate IFTA reporting and compliance tracking.
vehicles.tip6: Schedule regular maintenance to prevent unexpected breakdowns.
vehicles.tip7: Track service history to identify recurring issues and predict maintenance needs.

messages.confirmDeleteDriver: Are you sure you want to delete this driver?
messages.confirmDeleteTruck: Are you sure you want to delete this truck?
messages.confirmDeleteMaintenance: Are you sure you want to delete this maintenance record?
messages.failedToLoad: Failed to load fleet data. Please try again later.

reports.title: Fleet Reports
reports.unlockDescription: Unlock comprehensive fleet reports including fleet summaries, maintenance schedules, document expiration reports, and automated weekly reporting.

healthScore.title: Fleet Health Score
healthScore.allDocumentsUpToDate: All documents are up to date!

vehicleForm.enterVehicleDetails: Enter vehicle details to add to your fleet
vehicleForm.failedToSaveVehicle: Failed to save vehicle. Please try again.

driverForm.enterDriverDetails: Enter driver details to add to your fleet

driversPage.title: Driver Management
driversPage.subtitle: Manage your drivers and monitor document expirations
driversPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, license, phone, email...
driversPage.getStartedAddFirstDriver: Get started by adding your first driver.
driversPage.upgradeYourPlan: Upgrade your plan to add drivers.
driversPage.noDriversMatchFilters: No drivers match your current filters
driversPage.driversHaveExpiredDocs: {{count}} driver has expired documents. Please update these documents to maintain compliance.
driversPage.driversHaveExpiredDocsPlural: {{count}} drivers have expired documents. Please update these documents to maintain compliance.
driversPage.tutorialDescription: Manage driver profiles and track document compliance
driversPage.tutorialFeature1Desc: Create profiles with contact info, license, and medical card details
driversPage.tutorialFeature2Desc: Monitor license and medical card expiration dates
driversPage.tutorialFeature3Desc: See at-a-glance which documents are expiring or expired
driversPage.tutorialFeature4Desc: Download driver list as CSV for compliance reporting
driversPage.tip1: Monitor document expiry - red/yellow badges show immediate attention needed
driversPage.tip2: Medical card expiry is often overlooked - set calendar reminders
driversPage.tip3: Use 'On Leave' status to preserve records without showing in active dispatch
driversPage.tip4: Keep license numbers updated for DOT background checks
driversPage.confirmDeleteDriver: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

driverDetailPage.driverNotFoundDesc: The driver you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
driverDetailPage.noLoadsAssigned: No loads assigned to this driver
driverDetailPage.confirmDeleteDriver: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone and will remove all associated records.

maintenancePage.title: Maintenance Management
maintenancePage.subtitle: Schedule, track and manage vehicle maintenance
maintenancePage.upgradeSubtitle: Upgrade to Fleet plan to access maintenance scheduling
maintenancePage.whatYouGet: What you'll get with Maintenance Scheduling:
maintenancePage.featureSchedule: Schedule preventive maintenance for your entire fleet
maintenancePage.featureAlerts: Get alerts when maintenance is due or overdue
maintenancePage.featureTrackCosts: Track maintenance costs and service history
maintenancePage.featureTypes: Multiple maintenance types: oil change, tire rotation, inspections, and more
maintenancePage.featureProviders: Service provider tracking and warranty management
maintenancePage.getStartedScheduling: Get started by scheduling your first maintenance task.
maintenancePage.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.
maintenancePage.tutorialDescription: Schedule, track and manage vehicle maintenance
maintenancePage.tutorialFeature1Desc: Create maintenance schedules based on date or mileage intervals
maintenancePage.tutorialFeature2Desc: Log repairs, parts replaced, and service providers
maintenancePage.tutorialFeature3Desc: Get notified when maintenance is due or overdue
maintenancePage.tutorialFeature4Desc: Track maintenance costs per vehicle for budgeting
maintenancePage.tip1: Schedule recurring maintenance like oil changes and inspections
maintenancePage.tip2: Record service provider details for warranty tracking
maintenancePage.tip3: Use the overdue filter to prioritize urgent maintenance
maintenancePage.tip4: Track maintenance costs to identify high-expense vehicles
maintenancePage.tipPreventive: Schedule preventive maintenance to reduce unexpected breakdowns and repair costs.
maintenancePage.tipOdometer: Track odometer readings to stay on top of mileage-based service intervals.
maintenancePage.tipProviderInfo: Keep service provider information for quick reference and warranty claims.
maintenancePage.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this {{type}} maintenance record? This action cannot be undone.
maintenancePage.failedToSave: Failed to save maintenance record. Please try again.
maintenancePage.failedToDelete: Failed to delete maintenance record. Please try again.
maintenancePage.failedToLoad: Failed to load maintenance records. Please try again later.
maintenancePage.failedToInit: Failed to initialize. Please refresh the page.

exportModal.title: Export Fleet Report
exportModal.subtitle: Generate and export comprehensive fleet reports
exportModal.description: Export detailed reports about your fleet including vehicle inventory, driver roster, maintenance schedules, and document expiration tracking.
exportModal.fleetSummaryDesc: Overview of vehicles, drivers, and fleet statistics
exportModal.documentExpirationDesc: Driver license and medical card expiry tracking
exportModal.fullFleetExportDesc: Complete data export with all fleet information
exportModal.exportError: Failed to generate report. Please try again.
